column5: Hi All. I was wondering if anyone has fished at North Spirt Lake Lodge north of Red Lake, Ontario. If so, how was your experience? How was the fishing and accomodations? Looking to possibly go in August/September. Thanks for any input!
I've eyeballed there website many times,but seems know one on WC goes there,and I haven't gone there either.
I talked to them at the show and it looks great but the only thing that concerned me is thereâ€™s a reservation there and would they be netting fish or other regulation issues.
